Who: RODIMUS PRIME, LEGACY, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Perceptor,
Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - Hole/chamber beneath hallway

Rodimus had been near to the top when he heard Tuscon talking to him
as if he were near to the bottom. He shifted himself around to look
down, and he could see what was happening. "Frag!" he said as he saw
the tell tale signs of blindness coming from Tuscon, especially
blindness without his head mounted sonar devices.

Kicking off from the side, Rodimus used his grappling line as a
repelling rope and slid all the way back down and retracted the line,
as he pulled his weapon out with one smooth move, "Perceptor, stand
down we don't have any time for this!" he said, his voice all
business."

The distinctive wine of a weapon powered to full strength could be
clearly heard from Rodimus as he glanced at Darkhwak and Tuscon while
keeping his weapon firmly trained on Perceptor, "There's GOT to be
another way out of here!" Rodimus said in frustration. "If only we had
that Sonar." Rodimus said under his breath as he thought furiously.

"Leagcy!" Rodimus said over the radio, "After the last battle of the
Minion invasion I believe that Scorponok and others, inclusing a few
Autobots were able to escape through a tunnel that Scorponok dug. Did
that reach all the way here?"

"No." Legacy's cold voice intoned. "According to the record of the
same ordeal that Kup gave us, they came up several hundred meters in
front of the pool of lava."

Legacy paused as his own formidable scanners went to work, analyzing
the underground network of tunnels. "However there is a tunnel 11.57
meters beyond that wall." A beam of light shot out from Legacy and hit
the wall, displaying the location. "For the moment it appears to be
unused, and the tempature is currently just within tolerable range for
a Cybertronian to use for a limited duration. However I would not
recommend the use of explosive ordinance to excavate the tunnel since
the room itself is generally unstable and too large of a disturbance
could open open up fissures that could quickly flood the room with
molten rock."

Rodimus nodded, "That's just what I wanted to hear." he said as a
smile appeared on his face, as his amber colored optics fixed on
Perceptor. "I have no interest in using explosives on the wall, not
when we have someone here who can perform that task so much more
efficiently!"

"Then I would suggest that you expidite matters, it will only be a
short while until Hydras and his subjects find another way to attack
us." Legacy turned his sensors to attempting to track the Decepticons
and Predacons.

(Summary: Rodimus jumps back down, and learns from Legacy that there
is another possible way out, but they will need Perceptor's talent for
digging to utilize it. Legacy scans for any approaching enemy units.)

(TAG)

Preston
